text: Yallaa kee kay farmoyta nummayseh yan marah wakti maxayyoowinnaa ken sorkoc√¥bbaxitte Yallih cusim (kassit) kee qhuraanak obteemit allagowtuh.kaadu keenik duma kitab kah yontocowwime maray edde luk wakti edde yexxeereeh sorkocobbaxitte kak kafteh inna (yahuud kee nasaara kinnuk) akke wayoonay, keenik maggo mari Yallih taaqatak yewqeh
